response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and functionality. Given its exceptional features and durability, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I am extending this opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $125. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment in quality and efficiency. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to serving you with our best product.", "product_price": 125}
